title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crisp.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in egg mixture quickly.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and garam masala for 1 hour.
Grill chicken until cooked.
Prepare sauce with tomatoes and cream.
Add grilled chicken to sauce and simmer 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir fry with fresh vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Chop all vegetables.
Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook 2 more minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Mexican-style tacos filled with seasoned beef, fresh lettuce, and cheese.
instructions: Cook minced beef with taco seasoning.
Warm taco shells in oven.
Fill shells with beef, lettuce, and cheese.
Serve immediately.
